Holy Roman Empire
Holy Roman Empire
Reichspost

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity and a free Trader with the Currency technology, Mechantilism Civic and Economics technology. Receive +1 [ICON_Production] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for routes between your own cities.
Landsknecht
Holy Roman Empire unique Medieval era unit. Replace the Pikeman. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat bonus to Military melee units. Lower maintenance costs.
Holy Roman Empire unique unit: Landsknecht
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat bonus to Melee units.
Trebuchet
Medieval era bombard unit, ideal for attacking cities. Cannot move and attack on the same turn unless they've earned the Expert Crew promotion.
Longswordsman
Strong Medieval era melee unit.
Ship of the line
Strong Industrial era naval ranged unit.

A district unique to Holy Roman Empire and Germany for industrial activity. Replaces the Industrial Zone district and cheaper to build.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Production] Production bonus for each adjacent Commercial Hub, Aqueduct, Canal, and Dam districts. +1 [ICON_Production] Production bonus for each adjacent resource. +1 [ICON_Production] Production bonus for every two adjacent district tiles.
Norwegian unique Medieval era melee unit. 4 [ICON_Movement] Movement if this unit starts in enemy territory. +8 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking.

When making Dedications at the beginning of a Golden Age or Heroic Age, receive the Normal Age bonus towards improving Era Score in addition to the other bonus. +50% [ICON_Production] Production towards defensive buildings. Mines over any resources and luxury resources provide +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith.
A district unique to Korea for scientific endeavors. Replaces the Campus district. +6 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science. Must be built on Hills.
Netherlands unique Industrial Era unit that replaces the Ship of the line. +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking defensible districts.
Brazilian unique Modern era unit that replaces the Battleship. Stronger than the Battleship.
